content: That's really helpful, thank you! I've actually been attending a weekly language exchange event in Omotesando, which has been great for my language skills. But I'll definitely check out some of these other options to mix things up and meet new people. By the way, do you have any recommendations for good yoga studios in Tokyo that offer English classes? I've recently joined a gym in my area that offers yoga classes in English, but I'm always looking to try out new studios and instructors.
